sentence.Network_en: Garton pensively stirred the hotchpotch of his hair.
sentence.Network_cn: 加顿沉思着搅动自己的乱发.

sentence.Network_en: His essay was a hotchpotch of other people's ideas.
sentence.Network_cn: 他的文章是把别人的想法拼凑在一起的大杂烩.

sentence.Network_en: They are all a hotchpotch of outstandingness and of virtue and vice, of nobility and baseness.
sentence.Network_cn: 她们皆是伟大与渺小,善良与邪恶, 高尚与低俗的混合体.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 造成这种“杂烩”（Hotchpotch）现状的原因在于美国的建国历史。众所周知，美国在建国之前，各个州都已独立。
英美常用词汇对照表 - 新月空中英语 ... hooter (汽笛) hotchpotch (大杂烩) ice lolly (冰棍).
hotchpot 掺杂物;双方损失合计数hotchpotch 掺杂物hotel barge 住宿驳

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: variant of hotchpot

entry.tran: 杂乱无章的一堆东西;大杂烩
entry.def: A hotch-potch is an untidy mixture of different types of things.

example.ex: The palace is a complete hotch-potch of architectural styles.
example.tran: 这座宫殿完全是各种建筑风格的大杂烩。

means.word_mean: 2. a stew (or thick soup) made with meat and vegetables

auth_sentence.content: Just the hotchpotch result of random events.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: This final fantasy, with its...hotchpotch of gnostic religions and sinister folklore.

auth_sentence.content: There's a slight hotchpotch quality to Overcome, flitting from experiment to experiment and lacking slightly in fluidity.
